about_the_game:
The Goblinseekers is a Cozy Graphic Adventure, made up of a compendium of short adventures. Travel through magic kingdoms, helping Wizards, Witches and Goblins with their tasks. In each Kingdom you will embark on thrilling adventures, solve intriguing puzzles, and encounter unique characters. Join the adventure now!

The Goblinseekers is a compendium of complete short stories (About two hours of play each) that, although they can be played individually, are linked together to tell an even greater story. Play once and again each story, finding new mysteries by choosing different paths so as to change the destiny of the Kingdoms!


Make your backpack, prepare your journey, and become a Goblinseeker
  • Play a Graphic Adventure with minigames, RPG and cards elements. Make potions, collect all the cards while influencing the storyline.
  • Find Lots of possibilities to replay. Explore both Kingdoms, each with its own people, chapters, unique items and mysteries. Meet needy goblins, grouchy Wizards, noisy Witches and unexpected traps.
  • Become a Witch or a Wizard, master your abilities, and let your decisions determinate the fate of the Kingdoms in this immersive adventure, Graphic Adventure with RPG elements.
  • Embrace your inner Wizard or Witch and prepare your potions in an enjoyable minigame. Fill your cauldron with the right ingredients and let the magic begin! Your potions will aid you on your adventure, as long as you don't make a mistake in the recipe.
  • Make Crucial decisions that influence the game. Every decision will open a new path.
  • Dive into an immersive story, becoming an integral part of the Kingdoms, aiding both Wizards and Witches (or both!) in a meticulously crafted narrative.
  • Enjoy a completely hand illustrated game, as cartoon characters. Choose how your Character looks like in the game, making it unique!



Art team have absorbed a large number of references to create The Goblinseekers. The art style might remind you of cartoons like Adventure Time, while the world is inspired by Discworld and Terry Pratchett's novels.

The videogame is also inspired by the TTRPG game of the same title. The Goblinseekers is a tabletop roleplaying game: you can become a Goblinseeker, choose your path, and determine the future of the Kingdoms. Grab your wand and get ready for an epic adventure!



In this world, Witches and Wizards lead separate lives due to centuries of resentment, resulting in natural animosity. Witches practice a different form of magic from Wizards, leading to heated debates over spell and potion crafting. Despite their differences, these arguments rarely escalate beyond sparks and fireworks.

Amidst this chaos are the Goblinseekers, children with unique and special abilities. They are young Witches and Wizards who leave their homes in search of something different. These children live together as a big family in the Lake Cabin, situated between the two Kingdoms. In this cabin, they eat, sleep, play, and share stories. Beyond this, the Goblinseekers have a mission to care for and protect anyone in need, whether they are Witches, Wizards, or goblins.



An emotional, enjoyable Graphic Adventure full of RPG elements, minigames and card games.
Travel through the Kingdoms, discovering different paths and sceneries in a Narrative Experience where each decision matters.
Brew potions, collect cards and personalize your character to make it unique.
Play it once and other discovering new secrets, differents endings and collect all the hidden cards
Fully hand illustrated in an evocative cartoon style that will draw you into the story!
